snippet: It was the first public effort by Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi to put his mark on the security forces battling Islamic State militants.
abstract: Iraqi Prime Min Haider al-Abadi removes 36 military commanders in sweeping shake-up in his first public attempt to put his mark on security forces battling to retake territory from Islamic State militants.
lead_paragraph: It was the first public effort by Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi to put his mark on the security forces battling Islamic State militants.

headline.main: In Shake-Up, Iraqi Premier Replaces 36 Commanders
headline.print_headline: In Shake-Up, Iraqi Premier Replaces 36 Commanders

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
